What's New:
Happy Lunar New Year!
- Channel your inner Monkey King by equipping the legendary skin “Aegis of Prosperity”
- Your Allies have succesfully killed some of those pesky bugs
- Thor and his allies will run a bit faster on some device

- Various visual and animation improvements
- Various balancing for salvage, treasure and trinity stone
- Fix some pesky bugs
- Summon treasure faster
- Faster gold auto collect
- Improve performance

New Features:
- Ally Weapon System > Collect your ally's weapon to make progress faster
- Improved Daily Bonus > Get bigger and better rewards including tons of Gems and Weapons
- Enchantments > Earn up to 200% of Gold and DPS boost for

V1.2.4 (72)
- Fixed claim 1 pet egg will reset the egg timer
- Fixed copy paste id not working
- Recover all ally option will show when player press "Ascension" at ascension popup
- Fixed Game Center achievements not sync with in-game achi

In this Halloween Update Thor is Cursed?!
Thor is cursed by the powerful Volva as he tried to infiltrate Niflheim on a mission to track down Loki.

- New Halloween Skin IAP : Skele-Thor
- All skins stat boost will stack
- Few UI update
